attributes.action: Stop hereford hospital closing leominster minor units
attributes.additional_details: U can ask anyone in leominster when hereford shutdowns our unit we feel vulnerable as a town with no back up if anything goes wrong leaving children and the elderly without help
attributes.background: Leominster community hospital is a life line. And we need it to stay open. Hereford continue to keep closing our unit for there needs but leave leominster family's without help.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Wye Valley NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament.
